property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.) While you have no shields, this creature has "blocker" and "At the end of each of your turns, you may untap this creature."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution-Put on one of your Cyber Viruses. Whenever you draw the card at the start of your turn, you may draw an extra card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Your opponent discards 2 cards at random from his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Each player puts a card from his mana zone into his graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature can't attack if you have no cards in your hand. Whenever this creature attacks, discard a card from your hand. This creature can't be blocked by any creature that has power 4000 or less. Triple breaker (This creature breaks 3 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.) Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} At the end of the turn, untap all your light creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.) Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Each of your water creatures gets "This creature can't be blocked" until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Until the end of the turn, each of your darkness creatures in the battle zone gets +4000 power and "double breaker." Whenever any of those creatures battles this turn, destroy it after the battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Each of your fire creatures gets "This creature can attack untapped creatures" until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} This turn, whenever any of your nature creatures is attacking your opponent and becomes blocked, it breaks one of his shields. (If a creature has "double breaker" or "triple breaker," it still breaks only one shield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: While you have no shields, this creature has "Blocker (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle)."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose a darkness or fire creature in the battle zone and tap it. (First choose what this creature is attacking. Then choose a creature to tap.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap all darkness creatures in the battle zone, or tap all fire creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.) Evolution-Put on one of your Initiates. Fire stealth (This creature can't be blocked while your opponent has any fire cards in his mana zone.) Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. Charger (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one of your creatures in the battle zone. This turn, it can't be blocked and you ignore any effects that would prevent that creature from attacking your opponent. (For example, ignore summoning sickness and card effects that say "This creature can't attack" or "This creature can't attack players." Your creatures can't attack creatures this way.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When one of your shields would be broken, you may destroy this creature instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Darkness stealth (This creature can't be blocked while your opponent has any darkness cards in his mana zone.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Add one of your creatures from the battle zone to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Water stealth (This creature can't be blocked while your opponent has any water cards in his mana zone.) When this creature would be destroyed, you may return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Choose a card in your opponent's mana zone and return it to his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.) Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Choose one of your creatures in the battle zone. It can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is destroyed, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may look at one of your opponent's shields. Then put it back where it was.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Then put them back in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. Charger (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, return a card from your mana zone to your hand. This creature can't be blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.) This creature can't be attacked. This creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may add up to 2 cards from your hand to your shields face down. If you do, choose the same number of your shields and put them into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of those shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature would be destroyed, you may return it to your hand instead. If you do, put a card from your hand into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Nature stealth (This creature can't be blocked while your opponent has any nature cards in his mana zone.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your shields and put it into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield. This creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution-Put on one of your Chimeras. Light stealth (This creature can't be blocked while your opponent has any light cards in his mana zone.) Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is destroyed, your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature is attacked, it gets "slayer" until the end of the turn. (Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your shields and put it into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) Destroy one of your opponent's untapped light or untapped nature creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: One of your creatures in the battle zone gets "slayer" until the end of the turn. (Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) Charger (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 8000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: While you have no other creatures in the battle zone, this creature has "Power attacker +4000 (While attacking, this creature gets +4000 power)" and "Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields)."

property.name: Rules
property.value: While you have no shields, this creature can attack untapped creatures and has "Power attacker +3000 (While attacking, this creature gets +3000 power)."

property.name: Rules
property.value: One of your creatures gets +2000 power until the end of the turn. Charger (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: While you have no shields, this creature gets +4000 power and has "Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields)."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less.

property.value: This creature can't be attacked. Power attacker +3000 (While attacking, this creature gets +3000 power.) Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Return a creature from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker. While this creature is tapped, your opponent can't use the 'Shield Trigger' ability of their shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one of your opponent's water or darkness creatures in the battle zone. Your opponent puts that creature into his mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) Whenever any of your creatures would be destroyed this turn, put it into your mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power for each other creature you have in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put one of your creatures from the battle zone into your mana zone. Charger (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.value: Power attacker +1000 (While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power.) Water stealth (This creature can't be blocked while your opponent has any water cards in his mana zone.)

property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Put up to 3 cards from your hand into your mana zone.
